full_summary:
Electronic Sweep Service Tender Announcement
================================================:=

### Specification Summary

The [Canadian Space Agency](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29627/9f030-23-0142---b---request-for-proposal-%28rfp---electronic-sweep-service.pdf) invites tenders for the provision of Electronic Sweep Service to consider threats to agency information and ensure the absence of electronic surveillance and eavesdropping devices in various locations.

### Description of Requirement
The [Canadian Space Agency](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29627/9f030-23-0142---b---request-for-proposal-%28rfp---electronic-sweep-service.pdf) requires a comprehensive electronic sweep service to safeguard its information and protect against sensitive data breaches.

### Key Dates
Key dates for the Electronic Sweep Service Tender:

*   Publication Date: January 17, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: February 1, 2024 at 14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

### Regions of Opportunity

The electronic sweep service will be required in the following regions:

*   Ontario (except National Capital Region (NCR))
*   Quebec (except NCR)
*   National Capital Region (NCR)

### Classification and Code
The service falls under the following classifications:

*   UNSPSC Code:
    *   *80161604* - Information technology IT management services
    *   *81141800* - Facilities management
    *   *81141801* - Safety or risk analysis
    *   *81141803* - Acoustics or noise control
    *   *81141804* - Equipment inspection service
    *   *81141805* - Building inspection service

### Tender Documents

Tender documents can be obtained from the below sources:

*   Request for Proposal (RFP) Document: 
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/29627/9f030-23-0142---b---request-for-proposal-%28rfp---electronic-sweep-service.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/29627/9f030-23-014
